HTML Sections¶

Terms¶

term

definition

<!doctype html>

Tells the browser that we want our document read in standard mode.

<html>

indicates that everything between its tags will be marked-up using HTML conventions.

<head>

contains meta-data about document style sheets and js libraries.

<body>

contains everything in the document that will be visible in the browser window.

<div>

stands for division used for additional sections.

web_fund_css
